webd4201.altons

Class StudentDA

  • java.lang.Object
    • webd4201.altons.StudentDA

  • public class StudentDA
extends java.lang.Object
    StudentDA.java Handles all CRUD interactions with student records stored in a PostgreSQL database using various prepared statements
    Since:
    1.0 (2021/2/7)

      • initialize

        initialize - establishes the database connection
        Parameters:

      • terminate

        public static void terminate()

      • create

        public static boolean create(Student aStudent)
                      throws DuplicateException
        create - Attempts to create a new student record in the database after checking if student's id is already present in student records
        Parameters:
        aStudent - A student object to be added to the database
        Returns:
        created A boolean representing success status of the attempt to create a new student record
        Throws:
        DuplicateException - Thrown in event that a student with the provided id already exists in the database records

      • retrieve

        public static Student retrieve(long id)
                        throws NotFoundException
        Attempts to retrieve a student based on their unique student id number
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the student attempting to be retrieved from the database
        Returns:
        aStudent Object containing details of the specified student
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - thrown if student id provided is not present in the database

      • update

        public static int update(Student aStudent)
                  throws NotFoundException,
                         java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.text.ParseException
        Update - updates an existing record in the database
        Parameters:
        aStudent - Student object containing updated details to be reflected in the database
        Returns:
        records An int representing the number of records updated by the query
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown if an attempt is made to update a student record that does not exist in the database
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if any SQL errors arise in attempting to execute prepared statement on database records
        java.text.ParseException - * Thrown if an error occurs trying to parse date string values into Date objects

      • delete

        public static int delete(Student aStudent)
                  throws NotFoundException,
                         java.sql.SQLException
        delete - Remove student record from the database
        Parameters:
        aStudent - Student object to be deleted from the database
        Returns:
        records An int representing the number of records deleted by the query
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown if an attempt is made to delete a student that is not present in the database
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if any SQL errors arise in attempting to execute prepared statement on database records

      • authenticate

        public static Student authenticate(long id,
                                   java.lang.String password)
                            throws NotFoundException
        Verifies that password and login match database records before returning a Student object containing a registered students account details *
        Parameters:
        id - The unique student ID associated with an account
        password - The password provided by the user, to be encrypted and compared to database record
        Returns:
        aStudent A Student object containing details of an authenticated user's registration details, or if authentication fails returns null to represent failed attempt to login
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown if attempt is made to update a student record using an id that is not present in the database
